title: The Decay of Lying - quotation is "vilely phrased"

content.question: Vivian probably calls the quotation from the poet "vilely phrased" (paragraph 4, sentence 3) because he

choices.label: knows that the street did not borrow its name from Oxford University
believes that the furniture sold in Oxford Street stores is too shabby for his taste
considers it a pretentious and roundabout way of saying something
sees in it contradictions of his ideas about art and nature

content.answer: considers it a pretentious and roundabout way of saying something

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
